text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Traceeeeen, Acadeeeeemy！！ Cheer-Leading-Squad！！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Members
text_block_list.text: Osuuu！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: We, the Tracen Academy Cheer Squad wereー！ Formed for the sake of the upcoming Spring Fan Appreciation Festivalー！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Members
text_block_list.text: Osuuu！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: For all the Uma Musume participating in eventsー！ We will vigorously cheer, so they can perform at their peakー！！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Members
text_block_list.text: Osuuu！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: For that endー We willー！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Bring in the Hyper Power DX Cheer Gear！ Just by wearing it, it can help support deep breathing！ Moreover, it comes with a built-in mic！！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ……Eh, Eeeeeeeeeh！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ooohoohoo, it was a nice surprise, wasn't it？ Keeping it a secret from even the rest of the squad was well worth it！！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Keeping it a secret means I had no way to stop you！ I mean, what the heck are you making Pearl-neesan do！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: It's no different from fireworks or a disco ball！ Glitzy things help lighten the mood！ And, isn't there a sense of romance to it？ That's why, Pearl-senpai……

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: FiiiiII～～ Iiight OooOOoo～～～～ Oon.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I have no idea what you're even talking about……

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Stoooooop right there！ King Halo！！ So the one messing with the school's loudspeakers without permission was you！？

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: The Disciplinary Committee's been getting complaints！！ Just when I thought the speakers suddenly stopped working, a weird song started…… huh, what the heck is thiiiiiis！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Geh, to think the Disciplinary Committee would figure it out so quickly…… Everyoneー, fall back for nooooーーーw！！ Retreat～～！！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Haa～aa…… geez, what the heck is up with these people…… I can't even keep up……

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ――Well, as you just heard, the Tracen Academy Cheering Squad is a group put together for the 『Spring Fan Appreciation Festival』.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Anyways, the 『Fan Appreciation Festival』 is held in the Spring and Fall, and to put it simply, spring is a "Sports Meet" and fall is a "Cultural Festival".

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: In regards to the Spring Fan Appreciation Festival, all around the campus, Uma Musume will participate in all kinds of sports events and festivities, for the entertainment of the fans.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: And so, this year, the leader of the Cheer Squad, the one taking charge of raising the excitement at each of the competitions, is King. Besides that, Pearl-san and me are part of the group, too.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ――Isn't that right, Pearl-san?

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: That's right！ As expected of Nature. You summed up everything that's happened 'til now！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: In that case, Pearl-san can you stop going with the flow so much……？ King is the type of girl to let things like this go straight to her head after all……

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: Oh, why？ That girl's ideas weren't bad at all. Besides, her way of thought――
(Ding Ding！ Beep Beep！！ Boom, Pi Pi Pii-！！ Pow Pow！ Pi Pii-！ Boom Shakalaka Boom Boom！)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ～～！？ W-what the heck is that music……？ Don't tell me, this is also……

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Aahー…………

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: W-what the heck is this！？ Who's making this racketー！？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: This week, the plan is to have people from outside the academy come and join the "Cheerleading Squad Practice Session". I know that they're really motivated butー……

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That gaudy costume and music…… and last time they made a giant firecracker…… Haaa～～ why are the leaders always doing something flashy……？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ……If I ask her what she's thinking, she doesn't seem like the type to tell me honestly.

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: Nature, do you want to know the answer！？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uu-uwaaaaaah！？ Pearl-san！？ M-my heart almost stopped……

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I just thought I heard the voice of someone who seemed a little lost. My body was moving before I knew it.

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: Anyways, getting back to King, it all started about a month ago. At least, based on what I know.

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: That day when the academy handed out the sign-up sheets for the events, King――
